messages.content:
You are an expert presentation designer. Create a compelling 5-slide presentation about "Digital Marketing Strategy" for a business audience using a professional tone.

Follow this structure:
1. Title slide
2. Overview/Agenda (if needed)
3. Main content slides (3-5 slides)
4. Key insights/takeaways
5. Conclusion/Next steps

For each slide, provide:
- slide_number: Sequential number starting from 1
- slide_type: One of "title", "section", "content", "quote", "conclusion"
- title: Clear, engaging slide title (string)
- content: Main slide content as a single string with bullet points separated by newlines
- speaker_notes: What the presenter should say (2-3 sentences as string)
- suggested_visuals: Brief description of relevant images/graphics (string)

IMPORTANT: All fields must be strings, not arrays. For bullet points, use newline characters to separate them within a single string.

Focus on text content without visual suggestions.

Respond with valid JSON containing an array of slide objects with the exact structure: {"slides": [...]}
Create a presentation about: Digital Marketing Strategy
